backend/main.mo: Defines actor with authorization mixin, types for donations, donors, spending, user profiles, and stores state plus profile management and phone validation logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing replacement of a UPI QR asset and listing related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping frontend file paths to short summaries explaining each component or page's purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including color tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up root container and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpendingFo: Form allowing admins to add spending records with validation, balance checks, and mutation submission.
Component that restricts access to admin-only sections based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and validate basic profile details before saving via API.
frontend/src/components/donate/DonationF: Donation submission form handling amount, user details, phone/UTR validation, prefilling profile data, and sending donation records.
frontend/src/components/donate/UpiPaymen: UI block for UPI payments including QR display, deep‑link attempts, copy helpers, and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/donors/DonorsTab: Table listing donors with initials, contact info, join date, and total donated, with navigation to individual donor pages.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Simple screen showing an access‑denied message with a button redirecting users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin-only layout providing header, navigation, mobile menu, and wrapper around admin routes using AdminGuard.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying copyright, tagline, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with logo, navigation, metrics display, admin links, and mobile menu controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, routed content, and triggers view tracking hooks.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerFil: Filter UI for ledger page allowing transaction type and sort order selection.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerTab: Table displaying transaction entries with links, formatted amounts, dates, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/ledger/RecentTra: Card showing the 10 most recent combined donation and spending records with navigation on click.
frontend/src/components/ledger/SpendingB: Pie chart summarizing categorized spending amounts using description-based category detection.
frontend/src/config/upi.ts: UPI payment config and function to generate a standardized UPI intent URI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Hook that checks if the authenticated caller is an admin using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, and restoring identities. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching donations, spending, metrics, and donor data from the backend actor. Handles actor readiness, defaults, retries, and pagination.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewTracking.ts: Implements page‑view tracking and live‑viewer session tracking with retries, heartbeats, and React Query cache invalidation. Ensures per‑tab view registration and session lifecycle management.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and UI tokens. Applies global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the App component and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDonationsP: Provides admin tools to review, confirm, decline, and manage donations, with status badges and UTR copying.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPortalPage: Shows admin metrics, trust balance, and navigation to management tools along with an informational notice.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSpendingPa: Admin page showing current balance, recent spending, and a form to record new spending.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI displaying trust balance, donations, spending stats, and recent activity using backend queries. Includes hero section, stats cards, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Donation page showing UPI instructions, transparency info, and a donation form. Adjusts messaging based on user identity and fetches caller profile.
frontend/src/pages/DonorDetailPage.tsx: Displays a donor’s full or public profile depending on admin status and lists their donations, with loading states and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DonorsPage.tsx: Shows a table of donors, fetching either full or public profiles based on admin status with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LedgerPage.tsx: Combines donations and spending into a sortable, filterable transaction ledger with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionDetailPage: Finds a specific donation or spending record and displays detailed transaction info, handling loading and not‑found scenarios.
frontend/src/utils/approvedImage.ts: Exports the approved image path used across the UI.
frontend/src/utils/donationInputNormaliz: Provides normalization and validation utilities for phone numbers, UTRs, and amount inputs.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint amounts into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/maskUtr.ts: Masks UTR values by exposing only the first and last three characters.
frontend/src/utils/phoneMask.ts: Masks phone numbers by showing the first five characters and replacing the rest with asterisks.
frontend/src/utils/upiQrImage.ts: Exports the file path for the UPI QR code image.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s build state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes.
